subject: How to print out names of test cases in testrunner?
msgSnippet: Hi there, we have a number of test classes, each containing several test methods. The developers add methods to these classes continuously. All test classes
messageBody:
Hi there,

we have a number of test classes, each containing several test
methods. The developers add methods to these classes continuously. All
test classes are combined in a testsuite, which runs with
junit.textui.TestRunner in a batch script.

What I would need to see in the output of that script is the name of
each test method which was executed. I want to avoid, that each method
should printout its name, but solve it automatically.

What could I do here?

Alex
